title: Video: Arctic Monkeys – You And I (Feat. Richard Hawley)
content:
Set to be the b-side to upcoming single Black Treacle, Arctic Monkeys have released a hastily shot promo video for You And I, featuring close friend Richard Hawley on lead vocals.

Showing the group laying down the track in a studio with the Sheffield crooner, it’s a very tongue in cheek affair, exhausting the quintessential worn down British cliches. The track itself continues in a similar vein to Suck It And See material, proving extremely 60’s inspired complete with soaring guitar riffs and coarse vocals. Recorded under the Death Ramps moniker, it’s the first time the group have used this title since releasing a limited edition 7″ single back in 2008. Check out You And I below, set to feature on Black Treacle, out 23 January.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
